name: desynchronize [demo]
description:
! this only a proof of concept & is very unfinished ! 

made for a jam in 20-ish hours, expect issues! please play the game in full screen otherwise text will be unreadable!

your mind has been linked to a monster, so you can see it's perspective. However, The monster cannot be heard or seen. Use noise to figure out it's location

Controls 

WASD - Move 

F - Pick up / Close Text (must be looking away from readable item)

E - Place Noisebox

Q  - Flashlight
